channel.title: Npc help!
channel.description:
Hi I need a quick tutorial for within 2 days heres why and what.
My friend birthday is coming up and I thought I might throw him a party on my server. I need a tut to explain hom to make npcs dance e.g. kinights danceing like real rs
ty please help! ;D
